name.baseName: Municipal wastewater treatment ; Wastewater ;sequencing batch reactor (SBR)+AO/BFB
市政污水处理;污水;序批式反应器（SBR）+AO/BFB

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Sequencing batch reactor (SBR) combined with AO (total ammonia oxidation) or BFB (biofilter) is an advanced wastewater treatment technology. In an SBR system, wastewater enters the reactor batch by batch and undergoes a series of treatment steps including aeration, sedimentation, and discharge.The AO and BFB technologies further optimize the removal of nitrogen and phosphorus, improve treatment efficiency, and are commonly used for municipal and industrial wastewater treatment with high efficiency and flexibility.
序批式反应器（SBR）结合AO（全氨氧化）或BFB（生物滤池）是一种先进的废水处理技术。在SBR系统中，废水逐批次进入反应器，经过一系列处理步骤，包括曝气、沉淀和排放。AO和BFB技术进一步优化了氮和磷的去除，提高了处理效率，常用于城市污水和工业废水处理，具有高效、灵活等特点。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Sequencing Batch Reactor (SBR) combined with AO/BFB process firstly utilizes Sequencing Batch Reactor (SBR) for biological treatment of wastewater, which includes the steps of thorough mixing, aeration, and sedimentation. Next, an AO (contact oxidation) or BFB (biofilter bed) process is used to further remove nitrogen compounds, which is accomplished through microbial reactions under aerobic and anoxic conditions. Finally, the treated water is discharged to complete the purification and treatment of wastewater.
序批式反应器（SBR）结合AO/BFB工艺首先利用序批式反应器（SBR）对废水进行生物处理，包括充分混合、曝气、沉淀等步骤。接着，采用AO（接触氧化）或BFB（生物滤床）工艺进一步去除氮化合物，通过好氧和缺氧条件下的微生物反应完成氮的去除。最后，经过处理的水体排放出，完成废水的净化和处理。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset describes the use of a combined sequencing batch reactor (SBR) and anaerobic/anoxic/oxic (AO) or biofilm biomembrane process (BFB) for municipal wastewater treatment. It is utilized for the treatment of sewage to reduce pollutants and improve water quality before discharge to receiving bodies or further use. This process is applicable for facilities treating residential or mixed industrial and municipal wastewater streams.
此数据集描述了序批式反应器（SBR）与厌氧/缺氧/好氧（AO）或生物膜生物膜过程（BFB）结合用于市政污水处理的情况。它用于处理污水，以减少污染物并提高水质，然后才将水排放到接受水体或用于其他用途。此过程适用于处理居住区污水或工业与市政混合污水流的设施。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Tong, L., Liu, X., Liu, X., Yuan, Z. & Zhang, Q. Life cycle assessment of water reuse systems in an industrial park. Journal of Environmental Management 129, 471–478 (2013).
Tong, L., Liu, X., Liu, X., Yuan, Z. & Zhang, Q. Life cycle assessment of water reuse systems in an industrial park. Journal of Environmental Management 129, 471–478 (2013).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for Life Cycle Assessment, ensure that the boundaries of the municipal wastewater treatment process are clearly defined. Include all inputs and outputs associated with the operation of the SBR+AO/BFB units. Users should account for the specific energy consumption, chemicals used in the process, waste sludge production, and potential emissions from the treatment. It is important to consider the treatment capacity and efficiency when applying this data to other scenarios to maintain accuracy. If a comparative assessment is conducted, ensure consistency in system boundaries, assumptions, and performance metrics.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，请确保清晰界定市政污水处理过程的边界。包括与 SBR+AO/BFB 单元操作相关的所有输入和输出。用户应考虑具体的能源消耗、过程中使用的化学品、废污泥产生量和治疗过程中可能的排放。在将此数据应用于其他场景时，考虑处理能力和效率非常重要，以保持准确性。如果进行比较评估，请确保系统边界、假设和性能指标的一致性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
